properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Varnimpalenu vivarimpalenu yesayya nivu naku cesina melu, Yesayya nivu naku chesina melu 4{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Andhakaramaina naku veluguniccinavu akhari bottu varaku Raktamicchinavu, Emani varnimpanu runam ela tirchanu, Yesayya nivu naku chesina melu{/lang-eng}
